availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James S. Lewis (Muhlenberg County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Andrew M. Lewis and Nancy Ann Hiley Lewis. Married to Eliza C. Gill Lewis in Muhlenberg County on February 20, 1859. Father of Georgeann Lewis, Lue Ellen Lewis, and Martha A. Lewis. Attended school in Muhlenberg County in 1850. Farmer in Muhlenberg County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, District 1, p. 206B.

Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, Boggess Precinct 2, p. 518B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County Marriages 1799-1875, Film #000557316, p. 248 of microfilm.
